test_cases.title: Valid Email and Password
steps: Click on the Sign In button
Click on the Sign In button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is successfully logged in and redirected to their account page

test_cases.title: Invalid Email
steps: Click on the Sign In button
Click on the Sign In button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the email address is not recognized

test_cases.title: Invalid Password
steps: Click on the Sign In button
Click on the Sign In button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the password is incorrect

test_cases.title: Empty Email Field
steps: Click on the Sign In button
Click on the Sign In button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the email field is required

test_cases.title: Empty Password Field
steps: Click on the Sign In button
Click on the Sign In button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the password field is required

test_cases.title: SQL Injection Attempt
steps: Click on the Sign In button
Enter a password containing SQL injection code
Click on the Sign In button
test_cases.expected_result: The SQL injection attempt is blocked and an error message is displayed

test_cases.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Attempt
steps: Click on the Sign In button
Enter a password containing XSS code
Click on the Sign In button
test_cases.expected_result: The XSS attempt is blocked and an error message is displayed
